scripts.deploy:localhost: pnpm prepare:localhost && pnpm build && pnpm create:local && pnpm deploy:local
scripts.deploy:container-compose: pnpm prepare:localhost && pnpm build && pnpm create:container && pnpm deploy:container
scripts.deploy:brokDev: pnpm prepare:brokDev && pnpm graph deploy --product hosted-service ohatland/brok_dev_13
scripts.deploy:brokStage: pnpm prepare:brokStage && pnpm graph deploy --product hosted-service  broklab/captable_stage_12
scripts.deploy:brokProd: pnpm prepare:brokProd && pnpm graph deploy --product hosted-service  broklab/captable_prod_12
